content.question: Crowding out is best described as which of the following?

choices.label: The decrease in full-employment output caused by an increase in taxes
The decrease in consumption or private investment spending caused by an increase in government spending
The decrease in government spending caused by a decrease in taxes
The increase in the amount of capital outflow caused by the increase in government spending
The increase in the amount of capital inflow caused by the increase in government spending

content.answer: The decrease in consumption or private investment spending caused by an increase in government spending

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe economic concepts, principles, or models.
